short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform ChatGPT's user interface with customisable accent colour, font styles and chats width, modern designs and chat bubbles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⚠️ IMPORTANT NOTICE⚠️ 
   • New ChatGPT A/B test layout detected for some users. Not available for me yet, but I'll be fixing compatibility issues as soon as it's rolled out on my end. 
   • If you have the new layout, your patience and understanding during this time would be greatly appreciated 🙏


📝 FEATURES 📝
   • Accent color and its live preview
   • Adjustable chat & prompt field width
   • Custom font family, size, line height, and spacing
   • Light, Dark, and Black (AMOLED friendly) more modern themes
   • Modern chat bubbles for clear message distinction
   • Easy theme switching with floating button
   • Spacious layout for comfortable chatting
   • Subtle animations for improved readability


🆕 RECENT UPDATES 🆕
   • Advanced Voice: Improved button design and voice selection interface
   • Chats: Fixed blank bubble flash on first prompt, reduced spacing, and improved source links visibility
   • Prompt Field: Fixed various styling issues with commands ('/') and GPT mentions ('@'). Improve reply balloons, and the most important: fixed full width flash bug and misalignment with chats
   • Search Chats:  Improve "Search chats" dialogs and add date pills like in sidebar
   • Source Links Dialog: Update source links dialog with searched links list
   • Visual Consistency: Updated unread indicators, ChatGPT logo, and dialog headers to match theme
   • Analysis Tools: Improved code snippet presentation and fixed visibility issues
   • DALL-E: Enhanced image buttons hover state
   • Plus Dialog: Fixed styling in upgrade 'Plus' plan card
   • Theme Alignment: Updated various elements to better match the accent color scheme
...and more


🔒 PERMISSIONS 🔒 
   • Storage: Saves your GPThemes preferences (font, accent colors, chat widths, etc.)
   • ChatGPT access: Customizes "chat.openai.com" and "chatgpt.com"


⚠️ NOTE ⚠️
   • Optimized for GPT-4o, GPT-4o mini, GPTs Store, DALL-E, and Browsing/Data Analysis.
   • OpenAI o1-preview and o1-mini models not fully supported yet.


🔧 COMPATIBILITY 🔧
   • Regular updates to maintain compatibility with ChatGPT changes. I appreciate your patience during any brief disruptions.


🆓 FREE AND OPEN SOURCE 🆓
   • Committed to accessibility and transparency. 

🔗 https://github.com/itsmartashub/GPThemes


🤝 FEEDBACK & SUPPORT 🤝 
   • If you encounter persistent issues or have suggestions for improvement, please feel free to open an issue on GitHub or contact me via email. Your feedback is invaluable and helps me identify and resolve problems more effectively.

🔗 https://github.com/itsmartashub/GPThemes/issues
📩 gpthemes.contact@gmail.com

Elevate your ChatGPT experience with GPThemes - where functionality meets style!
